mapper.select: select count(*) from `event` where updated >= #{startTimestamp} and updated < #{endTimestamp}

select count(*) from (select event_id,group_id,updated from `event` where group_id is not NULL) as A inner JOIN (select group_id,country from `group`) as B ON A.group_id = B.group_id where updated >= #{startTimestamp} and updated < #{endTimestamp} and country = 'US'
SELECT years as time,count(*) as num FROM (select FROM_UNIXTIME(cast(cast(updated as UNSIGNED INTEGER)/1000 as UNSIGNED INTEGER),'%Y') AS years,event_id from `event`) as A GROUP BY years
